Description: Marl pottery jar with flat base, rounded sides and low neck with everted rim. Body scraped to trim and many scrape marks are visible especially on shoulder.
Curator's comments: For excavations see E. R. Ayrton & W. L. S. Loat, 'Pre-dynastic cemetery at El Mahasna' (London, 1911). Cf pl. xxxviii.53p Type like Late ware L53H in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery
